com.philips.pins.shinelib

Interface SHNDevice.SHNDeviceListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SHNDevice

    public static interface SHNDevice.SHNDeviceListener
    Interface that provides updates for connection state changes of the SHNDevice.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFailedToConnect(SHNDevice shnDevice, SHNResult result)
      Indicates that the initiated connection was not successful.
      void onReadRSSI(int rssi)
      The rssi from the peripheral
      void onStateUpdated(SHNDevice shnDevice)
      Indicates that the peripheral state changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onStateUpdated

        void onStateUpdated(SHNDevice shnDevice)
        Indicates that the peripheral state changed.

        Please note that when the user receives this callback and retrieves the state via the SHNDevice.getState() method, the state may already have changed again and a second onStateUpdated(SHNDevice) is already queued. This can happen for example when disconnecting and the device state changes rapidly from SHNDevice.State.Connected to SHNDevice.State.Disconnecting to SHNDevice.State.Disconnected. In this case there are two state changes resulting in to calls to onStateUpdated(SHNDevice), but at the time the first callback is processed by the listener, the device state may have already changed state to SHNDevice.State.Disconnected.

        Parameters:
        shnDevice - instance that has changed state

      • onFailedToConnect

        void onFailedToConnect(SHNDevice shnDevice,
                       SHNResult result)
        Indicates that the initiated connection was not successful.
        Parameters:
        shnDevice - instance that has changed state
        result - reason for the connection to fail

      • onReadRSSI

        void onReadRSSI(int rssi)
        The rssi from the peripheral
        Parameters:
        rssi - value as read from the peripheal
